DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine ( 13vPnC ) compare Prevenar ( 7vPnC ) , give concomitantly routine paediatric vaccination India .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Infants India
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Healthy infant age 6 week ( 4272 day ) time enrolment 2 . Available entire study period Exclusion Criteria 1 . Previous vaccination pneumococcal , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis Hib vaccines 2 . A previous anaphylactic reaction vaccine vaccinerelated component 3 . Contraindication vaccination pneumococcal , Hib , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , polio , hepatitis B measles vaccine
